message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I really like the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $105?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more like $92.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! I can do $98.50. That's my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more like $95. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
